GK19asvbuc2u:233: yaśodharāṃ nāma yaśoviśālāṃ vāmābhidhānāṃ śriyamājuhāva // Bc_2.26 //
GK19asvbuc2u:235: sārdha tayā śākyanarendravadhvā śacyā sahasrākṣa ivābhireme // Bc_2.27 //

GK19asvbuc2u:245: vimānapṛṣṭhānna mahīṃ jagāma vimānapṛṣṭhādiva puṇyakarmā // Bc_2.32 //
GK19asvbuc2u:247: śame 'bhireme virarāma pāpādbheje damaṃ saṃvibabhāja sādhūn // Bc_2.33 //
GK19asvbuc2u:248: nādhīravatkāmasukhe sasañje na saṃrarañje viṣamaṃ jananyām /
GK19asvbuc2u:250: nādhyaiṣṭa duḥkhāya parasya vidyāṃ jñānaṃ śivaṃ yattu tadadhyagīṣṭa /
GK19asvbuc2u:251: svābhyaḥ prajābhyo hi yathā tathaiva sarvaprajābhyaḥ śivamāśaśaṃse // Bc_2.35 //
GK19asvbuc2u:252: bhaṃ bhāsuraṃ cāṅgirasādhidevaṃ yathāvadānarca tadāyuṣe saḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:253: juhāva havyānyakṛśe kṛśānau dadau dvijebhyaḥ kṛśanaṃ ca gāśca // Bc_2.36 //
GK19asvbuc2u:254: sasnau śarīraṃ pavituṃ manaśca tīrthāmbubhiścaiva guṇāmbubhiśca /
GK19asvbuc2u:255: vedopadiṣṭaṃ samamātmajaṃ ca somaṃ papau śāntisukhaṃ ca hārdam // Bc_2.37 //
GK19asvbuc2u:256: sāntvaṃ babhāṣe na ca nārthavadyajjajalpa tattvaṃ na ca vipriyaṃ yat /
GK19asvbuc2u:257: sāntvaṃ hyatattvaṃ paruṣaṃ ca tattvaṃ hriyāśakannātmana eva vaktum // Bc_2.38 //
GK19asvbuc2u:258: iṣṭeṣvaniṣṭeṣu ca kāryavatsu na rāgadoṣāśrayatāṃ prapede /
GK19asvbuc2u:259: śivaṃ siṣeve vyavahāraśuddhaṃ yajñaṃ hi mene na tathā yathā tat // Bc_2.39 //
GK19asvbuc2u:262: ekaṃ vininye sa jugopa sapta saptaiva tatyāja rarakṣa pañca /

GK19asvbuc2u:265: babandha sāntvena phalena caitāṃstyāgo 'pi teṣāṃ hyanayāya dṛṣṭaḥ // Bc_2.42 //
GK19asvbuc2u:269: na cāvivakṣīd dviṣatāmadharma na cāvivākṣīddhṛdayena manyum // Bc_2.44 //
GK19asvbuc2u:270: tasmiṃstathā bhūmipatau pravṛtte bhṛtyāśca paurāśca tathaiva ceruḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:271: śamātmake cetasi viprasanne prayuktayogasya yathendriyāṇi // Bc_2.45 //
GK19asvbuc2u:273: śauddhodane rāhusapatnavaktro jajñe suto rāhula eva nāmnā // Bc_2.46 //
GK19asvbuc2u:274: atheṣṭaputraḥ paramapratītaḥ kulasya vṛddhiṃ prati bhūmipālaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:275: yathaiva putraprasave nananda tathaiva pautraprasave nananda // Bc_2.47 //
GK19asvbuc2u:276: putrasya me putragato mameva snehaḥ kathaṃ syāditi jātaharṣaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:277: kāle sa taṃ taṃ vidhimālalambe putrapriyaḥ svargamivārurukṣan // Bc_2.48 //
GK19asvbuc2u:280: ajājvaliṣṭātha sa puṇyakarmā nṛpaśriyā caiva tapaḥśriyā ca /
GK19asvbuc2u:281: kulena vṛttena dhiyā ca dīptastejaḥ sahasrāṃśurivotsisṛkṣuḥ // Bc_2.50 //
GK19asvbuc2u:283: cakāra karmāṇi ca duṣkarāṇi prajāḥ sisṛkṣuḥ ka ivādikāle // Bc_2.51 //
GK19asvbuc2u:284: tatyāja śastraṃ vimamarśa śāstraṃ śamaṃ siṣeve niyamaṃ viṣehe /
GK19asvbuc2u:285: vaśīva kaṃcidviṣayaṃ na bheje piteva sarvānviṣayāndadarśa // Bc_2.52 //
GK19asvbuc2u:286: babhāra rājyaṃ sa hi putrahetoḥ putraṃ kulārthaṃ yaśase kulaṃ tu /
GK19asvbuc2u:288: evaṃ sa dharma vividhaṃ cakāra sidbhirnipātaṃ śrutitaśca siddham /
GK19asvbuc2u:289: dṛṣṭvā kathaṃ putramukhaṃ suto me vanaṃ na yāyāditi nāthamānaḥ // Bc_2.54 //
GK19asvbuc2u:290: rirakṣiṣantaḥ śriyamātmasaṃsthāṃ rakṣanti putrān bhuvi bhūmipālāḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:291: putraṃ narendraḥ sa tu dharmakāmo rarakṣa dharmādviṣayeṣu muñcan // Bc_2.55 //
GK19asvbuc2u:293: ata upacitakarmā rūḍhamūle 'pi hetau sa ratimupasiṣeve bodhimāpanna yāvat // Bc_2.56 //
GK19asvbuc2u:294: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye antaḥpuravihāro nāma dvitīyaḥ sargaḥ // 2 //
GK19asvbuc2u:297: śuśrāva padmākaramaṇḍitāni gītairnibaddhāni sa kānanāni // Bc_3.1 //
GK19asvbuc2u:299: bahiḥprayāṇāya cakāra buddhimantargṛhe nāga ivāvarūddhaḥ // Bc_3.2 //
GK19asvbuc2u:300: tato nṛpastasya niśamya bhāvaṃ putrābhidhānasya manorathasya /
GK19asvbuc2u:301: snehasya lakṣmyā vayasaśca yogyāmājñāpayāmāsa vihārayātrām // Bc_3.3 //
GK19asvbuc2u:303: mā bhūtkumāraḥ sukumāracittaḥ saṃvignacetā iti manyamānaḥ // Bc_3.4 //
GK19asvbuc2u:305: tataḥ samutsārya pareṇa sāmnā śobhāṃ parāṃ rājapathasya cakuḥ // Bc_3.5 //
GK19asvbuc2u:306: tataḥ kṛte śrīmati rājamārge śrīmānvinītānucaraḥ kumāraḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:308: atho narendraḥ sutamāgatāśruḥ śirasyupāghrāya ciraṃ nirīkṣya /
GK19asvbuc2u:309: gaccheti cājñāpayati sma vācā snehānna cainaṃ manasā mumoca // Bc_3.7 //
GK19asvbuc2u:313: mārgaṃ prapede sadṛśānuyātraścandraḥ sanakṣatra ivāntarīkṣam // Bc_3.9 //
GK19asvbuc2u:315: śanaiḥ śanai rājapathaṃ jagāhe pauraiḥ samantādabhivīkṣyamāṇaḥ // Bc_3.10 //
GK19asvbuc2u:316: taṃ tuṣṭuvuḥ saumyaguṇena kecidvavandire dīptatayā tathānye /
GK19asvbuc2u:320: tataḥ kumāraḥ khalu gacchatīti śrutvā striyaḥ preṣyajanātpravṛttim /
GK19asvbuc2u:321: didṛkṣayā harmyatalāni jagmurjanena mānyena kṛtābhyanujñāḥ // Bc_3.13 //
GK19asvbuc2u:328: śīghraṃ samarthāpi tu gantumanyā gatiṃ nijagrāha yayau na tūrṇam /
GK19asvbuc2u:331: tāsāṃ tadā sasvanabhūṣaṇānāṃ vātayaneṣvapraśamo babhūva // Bc_3.18 //
GK19asvbuc2u:333: strīṇāṃ virejurmukhapaṅkajāni saktāni harmyeṣviva paṅkajāni // Bc_3.19 //
GK19asvbuc2u:337: mukhāni rejuḥ pramodottamānāṃ baddhāḥ kalāpā iva paṅkajānām // Bc_3.21 //
GK19asvbuc2u:338: taṃ tāḥ kumāraṃ pathi vīkṣamāṇāḥ striyo babhurgāmiva gantukāmāḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:340: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ rājasutaṃ striyastā jājvalyamānaṃ vapuṣā śriyā ca /
GK19asvbuc2u:341: dhanyāsya bhāryeti śanairavocañśuddhairmanobhiḥ khalu nānyabhāvāt // Bc_3.23 //
GK19asvbuc2u:342: ayaṃ kila vyāyatapīnabāhū rūpeṇa sākṣādiva puṣpaketuḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:343: tyaktvā śriyaṃ dharmamupaiṣyatīti tasmin hi tā gauravameva cakruḥ // Bc_3.24 //
GK19asvbuc2u:344: kīrṇa tathā rājapathaṃ kumāraḥ paurairvinītaiḥ śucidhīraveṣaiḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:346: puraṃ tu tatsvargamiva prahṛṣṭaṃ śuddhādhivāsāḥ samavekṣya devāḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:347: jīrṇaṃ naraṃ nirmamire prayātuṃ saṃcodanārthaṃ kṣitipātmajasya // Bc_3.26 //
GK19asvbuc2u:348: tataḥ kumāro jarayābhibhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā narebhyaḥ pṛthagākṛtiṃ tam /
GK19asvbuc2u:350: ka eṣa bhoḥ sūta naro 'bhyupetaḥ keśaiḥ sitairyaṣṭiviṣaktahaṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:351: bhrūsaṃvṛtākṣaḥ śithilānatāṅgaḥ kiṃ vikriyaiṣā prakṛtiryadṛcchā // Bc_3.28 //
GK19asvbuc2u:354: rūpasya hantrī vyasanaṃ balasya śokasya yonirnidhana ratīnām /
GK19asvbuc2u:355: nāśaḥ smṛtīnāṃ ripurindriyāṇāmeṣā jarā nāma yayaiṣa bhagnaḥ // Bc_3.30 //
GK19asvbuc2u:356: pītaṃ hyanenāpi payaḥ śiśutve kālena bhūyaḥ parisṛptamurvyām /
GK19asvbuc2u:357: krameṇa bhūtvā ca yuvā vapuṣmān krameṇa tenaiva jarāmupetaḥ // Bc_3.31 //
GK19asvbuc2u:358: ityevamukte calitaḥ sa kiṃcidrājātmajaḥ sūtamidaṃ babhāṣe /
GK19asvbuc2u:359: kimeṣa doṣo bhavitā mamāpītyasmai tataḥ sārathirabhyuvāca // Bc_3.32 //
GK19asvbuc2u:361: evaṃ jarāṃ rūpavināśayitrīṃ jānāti caivecchati caiva lokaḥ // Bc_3.33 //
GK19asvbuc2u:363: śrutvā jarāṃ savivije mahātmā mahāśanerghoṣamivāntike gauḥ // Bc_3.34 //
GK19asvbuc2u:364: niḥśvasya dīrghaṃ svaśiraḥ prakampya tasmiṃśca jīrṇe viniveśya cakṣuḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:365: tāṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā janatāṃ saharṣāṃ vākyaṃ sa saṃvigna idaṃ jagāda // Bc_3.35 //
GK19asvbuc2u:366: evaṃ jarā hanti ca nirviśeṣaṃ smṛtiṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca /
GK19asvbuc2u:367: na caiva saṃvegamupaiti lokaḥ pratyakṣato 'pīdṛśamīkṣamāṇaḥ // Bc_3.36 //
GK19asvbuc2u:368: evaṃ gate sūta nivartayāśvān śīghraṃ gṛhāṇyeva bhavānprayātu /
GK19asvbuc2u:369: udyānabhūmau hi kuto ratirme jarābhaye cetasi vartamāne // Bc_3.37 //
GK19asvbuc2u:370: athājñayā bhartusutasya tasya nivartayāmāsa rathaṃ niyantā /
GK19asvbuc2u:371: tataḥ kumāro bhavanaṃ tadeva cintāvaśaḥ śūnyamiva prapede // Bc_3.38 //
GK19asvbuc2u:372: yadā tu tatraiva na śarma lebhe jarā jareti praparīkṣamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:373: tato narendrānumataḥ sa bhūyaḥ krameṇa tenaiva bahirjagāma // Bc_3.39 //
GK19asvbuc2u:374: athāparaṃ vyādhiparītadehaṃ ta eva devāḥ sasṛjurmanuṣyam /
GK19asvbuc2u:375: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ sārathimābabhāṣe śauddhodanistadgatadṛṣṭireva // Bc_3.40 //
GK19asvbuc2u:377: ambeti vācaṃ karuṇaṃ bruvāṇaḥ paraṃ samāśritya naraḥ ka eṣaḥ // Bc_3.41 //
GK19asvbuc2u:379: rogābhidhānaḥ sumahānanarthaḥ śakto 'pi yenaiṣa kṛto 'svatantraḥ // Bc_3.42 //
GK19asvbuc2u:380: ityūcivān rājasutaḥ sa bhūyastaṃ sānukampo naramīkṣamāṇaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:381: asyaiva jāto pṛthageṣa doṣaḥ sāmānyato rogabhayaṃ prajānām // Bc_3.43 //
GK19asvbuc2u:382: tato babhāṣe sa rathapraṇetā kumāra sādhāraṇa eṣa doṣaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:383: evaṃ hi rogaiḥ paripīḍyamāno rujāturo harṣamupaiti lokaḥ // Bc_3.44 //
GK19asvbuc2u:384: iti śrutārthaḥ sa viṣaṇṇacetāḥ prāvepatāmbūrmigataḥ śaśīva /
GK19asvbuc2u:385: idaṃ ca vākyaṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ provāca kiṃcinmṛdunā svareṇa // Bc_3.45 //
GK19asvbuc2u:386: idaṃ ca rogavyasanaṃ prajānāṃ paśyaṃśca viśrambhamupaiti lokaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:387: vistīrṇamajñānamaho narāṇāṃ hasanti ye rogabhayairamuktāḥ // Bc_3.46 //
GK19asvbuc2u:389: śrutvā ca me rogabhayaṃ ratibhyaḥ pratyāhataṃ saṃkucatīva cetaḥ // Bc_3.47 //
GK19asvbuc2u:390: tato nivṛttaḥ sa nivṛttaharṣaḥ pradhyānayuktaḥ praviveśa veśma /
GK19asvbuc2u:391: taṃ dvistathā prekṣya ca saṃnivṛttaṃ paryeṣaṇaṃ bhūmipatiścakāra // Bc_3.48 //
GK19asvbuc2u:392: śrutvā nimittaṃ tu nivartanasya saṃtyaktamātmānamanena mene /
GK19asvbuc2u:393: mārgasya śaucādhikṛtāya caiva cukrośa ruṣṭo 'pi ca nogradaṇḍaḥ // Bc_3.49 //
GK19asvbuc2u:394: bhūyaśca tasmai vidadhe sutāya viśeṣayuktaṃ viṣayapracāram /
GK19asvbuc2u:395: calendriyatvādapi nāma sakto nāsmānvijahyāditi nāthamānaḥ // Bc_3.50 //
GK19asvbuc2u:396: yadā ca śabdādibhirindriyārthairantaḥpure naiva suto 'sya reme /
GK19asvbuc2u:397: tato bahirvyādiśati sma yātrāṃ rasāntaraṃ syāditi manyamānaḥ // Bc_3.51 //
GK19asvbuc2u:398: snehācca bhāvaṃ tanayasya buddhvā sa rāgadoṣānavicintya kāṃścit /
GK19asvbuc2u:399: yogyāḥ samājñāpayati sma tatra kalāsvabhijñā iti vāramukhyāḥ // Bc_3.52 //
GK19asvbuc2u:400: tato viśeṣeṇa narendramārge svalaṃkṛte caiva parīkṣite ca /
GK19asvbuc2u:401: vyatyasya sūtaṃ ca rathaṃ ca rājā prasthāpayāmāsa bahiḥ kumāram // Bc_3.53 //
GK19asvbuc2u:402: tatastathā gacchati rājaputre taireva devairvihito gatāsuḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:403: taṃ caiva mārge mṛtamuhyamānaṃ sūtaḥ kumāraśca dadarśa nānyaḥ // Bc_3.54 //
GK19asvbuc2u:404: athabravīdrājasutaḥ sa sūtaṃ naraiścaturbhihriyate ka eṣaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:409: saṃvardhya saṃrakṣya ca yatnavadbhiḥ priyapriyaistyajyata eṣa ko 'pi // Bc_3.57 //
GK19asvbuc2u:410: iti praṇetuḥ sa niśamya vākyaṃ saṃcukṣubhe kiṃciduvāca cainam /
GK19asvbuc2u:411: kiṃ kevalo 'syaiva janasya dharmaḥ sarvaprajānāmayamīdṛśo 'ntaḥ // Bc_3.58 //
GK19asvbuc2u:412: tataḥ praṇetā vadati sma tasmai sarvaprajānāmidamantakarma /
GK19asvbuc2u:413: hīnasya madhyasya mahātmano vā sarvasya loke niyato vināśaḥ // Bc_3.59 //
GK19asvbuc2u:414: tataḥ sa dhīro 'pi narendrasūnuḥ śrutvaiva mṛtyuṃ viṣasāda sadyaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:415: aṃsena saṃśliṣya ca kūbarāgraṃ provāca nihrādavatā svareṇa // Bc_3.60 //
GK19asvbuc2u:416: iyaṃ ca niṣṭhā niyatā prajānāṃ pramādyati tyaktabhayaśca lokaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:417: manāṃsi śaṅke kaṭhināni nṝṇāṃ svasthāstathā hyadhvani vartamānāḥ // Bc_3.61 //
GK19asvbuc2u:418: tasmādrathaḥ sūta nivartyatā no vihārabhūmerna hi deśakālaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:419: jānanvināśaṃ kathamartikāle sacetanaḥ syādiha hi pramattaḥ // Bc_3.62 //
GK19asvbuc2u:420: iti bruvāṇe 'pi narādhipātmaje nivartayāmāsa sa naiva taṃ ratham /
GK19asvbuc2u:421: viśeṣayuktaṃ tu narendraśāsanātsa padmaṣaṇḍaṃ vanameva niryayau // Bc_3.63 //
GK19asvbuc2u:423: vimānavatsa kamalacārudīrghikaṃ dadarśa tadvanamiva nandanaṃ vanam // Bc_3.64 //
GK19asvbuc2u:426: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye saṃvegotpattirnāma tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ // 3 //
GK19asvbuc2u:433: niścalaiḥ prītivikacaiḥ pibantya iva locanaiḥ // Bc_4.3 //
GK19asvbuc2u:434: taṃ hi tā menire nāryaḥ kāmo vigrahavāniti /
GK19asvbuc2u:437: avatīrṇo mahī sākṣād guḍhāṃśuścandramā iti // Bc_4.5 //
GK19asvbuc2u:440: evaṃ tā dṛṣṭimātreṇa nāryo dadṛśureva tam /
GK19asvbuc2u:441: na vyājahurna jahasuḥ prabhāveṇāsya yantritāḥ // Bc_4.7 //
GK19asvbuc2u:451: strīṇāmeva ca śaktāḥ stha saṃrāge kiṃ punarnṛṇām // Bc_4.12 //

GK19asvbuc2u:455: sadṛśaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ hi syādapi vā gopāyoṣitām // Bc_4.14 //
GK19asvbuc2u:457: strīṇāmapi mahatteja itaḥ kāryo 'tra niścayaḥ // Bc_4.15 //
GK19asvbuc2u:465: upāyairvividhaiḥ śāntā jagrāha ca jahāra ca // Bc_4.19 //
GK19asvbuc2u:469: lalitaṃ pūrvavayasaṃ kiṃ punarnṛpateḥ sutam // Bc_4.21 //
GK19asvbuc2u:470: tadevaṃ sati viśrabdhaṃ prayatadhvaṃ tathā yathā /
GK19asvbuc2u:471: iyaṃ nṛpasya vaṃśaśrīrito na syātparāṅmukhī // Bc_4.22 //
GK19asvbuc2u:472: yā hi kāścidyuvatayo haranti sadṛśaṃ janam /
GK19asvbuc2u:473: nikṛṣṭotkṛṣṭayorbhāvaṃ yā gṛhṇanti tu tāḥ striyaḥ // Bc_4.23 //
GK19asvbuc2u:474: ityudāyivacaḥ śrutvā tā viddhā iva yoṣitaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:479: jahuḥ kṣipramaviśrambhaṃ madena madanena ca // Bc_4.26 //
GK19asvbuc2u:482: sa tasmin kānane ramye jajvāla strīpuraḥsaraḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:485: kaṭhinaiḥ paspṛśuḥ pīnaiḥ saṃhatairvalgubhiḥ stanaiḥ // Bc_4.29 //
GK19asvbuc2u:487: anṛtaṃ skhalitaṃ kācitkṛtvainaṃ sasvaje balāt // Bc_4.30 //
GK19asvbuc2u:509: idaṃ puṣpaṃ tu kasyeti papraccha madaviklavā // Bc_4.41 //
GK19asvbuc2u:511: uvācainaṃ jitaḥ strībhīrjaya bho pṛthivīmimām // Bc_4.42 //
GK19asvbuc2u:515: hemapañjararuddho vā kokilo yatra kūjati // Bc_4.44 //
GK19asvbuc2u:517: ruvanti bhramarā yatra dahyamānā ivāgninā // Bc_4.45 //
GK19asvbuc2u:519: śuklavāsā iva naraḥ striyā pītāṅgarāgayā // Bc_4.46 //
GK19asvbuc2u:521: yo nakhaprabhayā strīṇāṃ nirbhīrtsata ivānataḥ // Bc_4.47 //
GK19asvbuc2u:526: dṛśyatāṃ strīṣu māhātmyaṃ cakravāko hyasau jale /
GK19asvbuc2u:531: na tu cintayato 'cintyaṃ janasya prājñamāninaḥ // Bc_4.52 //
GK19asvbuc2u:535: martavyamiti sodvego na jaharṣa na vivyathe // Bc_4.54 //
GK19asvbuc2u:537: samaṃ vignena dhīreṇa cintayāmāsa cetasā // Bc_4.55 //
GK19asvbuc2u:538: kiṃ tvimā nāvagacchanti capalaṃ yauvanaṃ striyaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:539: yato rūpeṇa saṃmattaṃ jarā yannāśayiṣyati // Bc_4.56 //
GK19asvbuc2u:541: tathā hṛṣṭā bhayaṃ tyaktvā jagati vyadhidharmiṇi // Bc_4.57 //
GK19asvbuc2u:543: tataḥ svasthā nirudvignāḥ krīḍanti ca hasanti ca // Bc_4.58 //
GK19asvbuc2u:544: jarāṃ vyādhiṃ ca mṛtyuṃ ca ko hi jānansacetanaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:546: yastu dṛṣṭvā paraṃ jīrṇa vyādhitaṃ mṛtameva ca /
GK19asvbuc2u:547: svastho bhavati nodvigno yathācetāstathaiva saḥ // Bc_4.60 //
GK19asvbuc2u:549: patati cchidyamāne vā taruranyo na śocate // Bc_4.61 //
GK19asvbuc2u:552: ahaṃ nṛpatinā dattaḥ sakhā tubhyaṃ kṣamaḥ kila /
GK19asvbuc2u:553: yāsmāttvayi vivakṣā me tayā praṇayavattayā // Bc_4.63 //
GK19asvbuc2u:557: yadi tvā samupekṣeya na bhavenmitratā mayi // Bc_4.65 //
GK19asvbuc2u:559: idaṃ na pratirūpaṃ te strīṣvadākṣiṇyamīdṛśam // Bc_4.66 //
GK19asvbuc2u:563: snehasya hi guṇā yonirmānakāmāśca yoṣitaḥ // Bc_4.68 //
GK19asvbuc2u:570: kāmaṃ paramiti jñātvā devo 'pi hi puraṃdaraḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:571: gautamasya muneḥ patnīmahalyāṃ cakame purā // Bc_4.72 //
GK19asvbuc2u:583: viśvācyāpsarasā sārdhaṃ reme caitrarathe vane // Bc_4.78 //
GK19asvbuc2u:587: avāpa bhraṃśamapyevaṃ na tu seje na manmatham // Bc_4.80 //
GK19asvbuc2u:595: atra ca tvānuneṣyāmi yatra mā duṣṭhu manyase // Bc_4.84 //
GK19asvbuc2u:597: anityaṃ tu jagamatvā nātra me ramate manaḥ // Bc_4.85 //
GK19asvbuc2u:598: jarā vyādhiśca mṛtyuśca yadi na syādidaṃ trayam /
GK19asvbuc2u:599: mamāpi hi manojñeṣu viṣayeṣu ratirbhavet // Bc_4.86 //
GK19asvbuc2u:601: doṣavatsvapi kāmeṣu kāmaṃ rajyeta me manaḥ // Bc_4.87 //
GK19asvbuc2u:607: saṃvego 'traiva kartavyo yadā teṣāmapi kṣayaḥ // Bc_4.90 //
GK19asvbuc2u:608: māhātmyaṃ na ca tanmanye yatra sāmānyataḥ kṣayaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:612: na cānuvartanaṃ tanme rucitaṃ yatra nārjavam /
GK19asvbuc2u:613: sarvabhāvena saṃparko yadi nāsti dhigastu tat // Bc_4.93 //
GK19asvbuc2u:615: kiṃ hi vañcayitavyaṃ syājjātarāgasya cetasaḥ // Bc_4.94 //
GK19asvbuc2u:617: nanu naiva kṣamaṃ draṣṭuṃ narāḥ strīṇāṃ nṛṇāṃ striyaḥ // Bc_4.95 //
GK19asvbuc2u:620: aho 'tidhīraṃ balavacca te manaścaleṣu kāmeṣu ca sāradarśinaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:621: bhaye 'titīvre viṣayeṣu sajjase nirīkṣamāṇo maraṇādhvani prajāḥ // Bc_4.97 //
GK19asvbuc2u:623: labhe na śāntiṃ na dhṛtiṃ kuto ratiṃ niśāmayandīptamivāgninā jagat // Bc_4.98 //
GK19asvbuc2u:624: asaṃśayaṃ mṛtyuriti prajānato narasya rāgo hṛdi yasya jāyate /
GK19asvbuc2u:625: ayomayīṃ tasya paraimi cetanāṃ mahābhaye rajyati yo na roditi // Bc_4.99 //
GK19asvbuc2u:626: atho kumāraśca viniścayātmikāṃ cakāra kāmāśrayaghātinīṃ kathām /
GK19asvbuc2u:627: janasya cakṣurgamanīyamaṇḍalo mahīdharaṃ cāstamiyāya bhāskaraḥ // Bc_4.100 //
GK19asvbuc2u:629: sva eva bhāve vinigṛhya manmathaṃ puraṃ yayurbhagnamanorathāḥ striyaḥ // Bc_4.101 //
GK19asvbuc2u:630: tataḥ purodyānagatāṃ janaśriyaṃ nirīkṣya sāyaṃ pratisaṃhṛtāṃ punaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:631: anityatāṃ sarvagatāṃ vicintayanviveśa dhiṣṇayaṃ kṣitipālakātmajaḥ // Bc_4.102 //
GK19asvbuc2u:632: tataḥ śrutvā rājā viṣayavimukhaṃ tasya tu mano
GK19asvbuc2u:633: na śiśye tāṃ rātriṃ hṛdayagataśalyo gaja iva /
GK19asvbuc2u:636: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye strīvighātano nāma caturthaḥ sargaḥ // 4 //
GK19asvbuc2u:639: na jagāma dhṛtiṃ na śarma lebhe hṛdaye siṃha ivātidigdhaviddhaḥ // Bc_5.1 //
GK19asvbuc2u:643: abhiruhya sa kanthakaṃ sadaśvaṃ prayayau ketumiva drumābjaketuḥ // Bc_5.3 //
GK19asvbuc2u:644: sa vikṛṣṭatarāṃ vanāntabhūmiṃ vanalobhācca yayau mahīguṇācca /
GK19asvbuc2u:645: salilormivikārasīramārgāṃ vasudhāṃ caiva dadarśa kṛṣyamāṇām // Bc_5.4 //
GK19asvbuc2u:647: samavekṣya rasāṃ tathāvidhāṃ tāṃ svajanasyeva vadhe bhṛśaṃ śuśoca // Bc_5.5 //
GK19asvbuc2u:649: vahanaklamaviklavāṃśca dhuryān paramāryaḥ paramāṃ kṛpāṃ cakāra // Bc_5.6 //
GK19asvbuc2u:651: jagato jananavyayaṃ vicinvan kṛpaṇaṃ khalvidamityuvāca cārtaḥ // Bc_5.7 //
GK19asvbuc2u:653: abhitaścalacāruparṇavatyā vijane mūlamupeyivān sa jambvāḥ // Bc_5.8 //
GK19asvbuc2u:654: niṣasāda sa yatra śaucavatyāṃ bhuvi vaidūryanikāśaśādvalāyām /
GK19asvbuc2u:658: adhigamya tato vivekajaṃ tu paramaprītisukhaṃ manaḥsamādhim /
GK19asvbuc2u:659: idameva tataḥ paraṃ pradadhyau manasā lokagatiṃ niśāmya samyak // Bc_5.11 //
GK19asvbuc2u:660: kṛpaṇaṃ bata yajjanaḥ svayaṃ sannavaśo vyādhijarāvināśadharmā /
GK19asvbuc2u:661: jarayārditamāturaṃ mṛtaṃ vā paramajño vijugupsate madāndhaḥ // Bc_5.12 //
GK19asvbuc2u:662: iha cedahamīdṛśaḥ svayaṃ sanvijugupseya paraṃ tathāsvabhāvam /
GK19asvbuc2u:663: na bhavetsadṛśaṃ hi tatkṣamaṃ vā paramaṃ dharmamimaṃ vijānato me // Bc_5.13 //
GK19asvbuc2u:666: na jaharṣa na cāpi cānutepe vicikitsāṃ na yayau na tandrinidre /
GK19asvbuc2u:667: na ca kāmaguṇeṣu saṃrarañje na vididveṣa paraṃ na cāvamene // Bc_5.15 //
GK19asvbuc2u:668: iti buddhiriyaṃ ca nīrajaskā vavṛdhe tasya mahātmano viśuddhā /
GK19asvbuc2u:671: narapuṃgava janmamṛtyubhītaḥ śramaṇaḥ pravrajito 'smi mokṣahetoḥ // Bc_5.17 //
GK19asvbuc2u:672: jagati kṣayadharmake mumukṣarmṛgaye 'haṃ śivamakṣayaṃ padaṃ tat /
GK19asvbuc2u:674: nivasan kvacideva vṛkṣamūle vijane vāyatane girau vane vā /
GK19asvbuc2u:676: iti paśyata eva rājasūnoridamuktvā sa nabhaḥ samutpapāta /
GK19asvbuc2u:677: sa hi tadvapuranyabuddhadarśī smṛtaye tasya sameyivāndivaukāḥ // Bc_5.20 //
GK19asvbuc2u:678: gaganaṃ khagavadgate ca tasminṛvaraḥ saṃjahṛṣe visismiye ca /
GK19asvbuc2u:679: upalabhya tataśca dharmasaṃjñāmabhiniryāṇavidhau matiṃ cakāra // Bc_5.21 //
GK19asvbuc2u:681: parivārajanaṃ tvavekṣamāṇastata evābhimataṃ vanaṃ na bheje // Bc_5.22 //
GK19asvbuc2u:682: sa jarāmaraṇakṣayaṃ cikīrṣurvanavāsāya matiṃ smṛtau nidhāya /
GK19asvbuc2u:683: praviveśa punaḥ puraṃ na kāmādvanabhūmeriva maṇḍalaṃ dvipendraḥ // Bc_5.23 //
GK19asvbuc2u:684: sukhitā bata nirvṛtā ca sā strī patirīdṛkṣa ihāyatākṣa yasyāḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:685: iti taṃ samudīkṣya rājakanyā praviśantaṃ pathi sāñjalirjagāda // Bc_5.24 //
GK19asvbuc2u:686: atha ghoṣamimaṃ mahābhraghoṣaḥ pariśuśrāva śamaṃ paraṃ ca lebhe /
GK19asvbuc2u:687: śrutavānsa hi nirvṛteti śabdaṃ parinirvāṇavidhau matiṃ cakāra // Bc_5.25 //
GK19asvbuc2u:691: samitau marutāmiva jvalantaṃ maghavantaṃ tridive sanatkumāraḥ // Bc_5.27 //
GK19asvbuc2u:692: praṇipatya ca sāñjalirbabhāṣe diśa mahyaṃ naradeva sādhvanujñām /
GK19asvbuc2u:693: parivivrajiṣāmi mokṣahetorniyato hyasya janasya viprayogaḥ // Bc_5.28 //
GK19asvbuc2u:694: iti tasya vaco niśamya rājā kariṇevābhihato drumaścacāla /
GK19asvbuc2u:695: kamalapratime 'ñjalau gṛhītvā vacanaṃ cedamuvāca bāṣpakaṇṭhaḥ // Bc_5.29 //
GK19asvbuc2u:696: pratisaṃhara tāt buddhimetāṃ na hi kālastava dharmasaṃśrayasya /
GK19asvbuc2u:697: vayasi prathame matau calāyāṃ bahudoṣāṃ hi vadanti dharmacaryām // Bc_5.30 //
GK19asvbuc2u:700: mama tu priyadharma dharmakālastvayi lakṣmīmavasṛjya lakṣmabhūte /
GK19asvbuc2u:701: sthiravikrama vikrameṇa dharmastava hitvā tu guruṃ bhavedadharmaḥ // Bc_5.32 //
GK19asvbuc2u:702: tadimaṃ vyavasāyamutsṛja tvaṃ bhava tāvannirato gṛhasthadharme /
GK19asvbuc2u:703: puruṣasya vayaḥsukhāni bhuktvā ramaṇīyo hi tapovanapraveśaḥ // Bc_5.33 //
GK19asvbuc2u:704: iti vākyamidaṃ niśamya rājñaḥ kalaviṅkasvara uttaraṃ babhāṣe /
GK19asvbuc2u:705: yadi me pratibhūtaścaturṣu rājan bhavasi tvaṃ na tapovanaṃ śrayiṣye // Bc_5.34 //
GK19asvbuc2u:706: na bhavenmaraṇāya jīvitaṃ me viharetsvāsthyamidaṃ ca me na rogaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:707: na ca yauvanamākṣipejjarā me na ca saṃpattimimāṃ haredvipattiḥ // Bc_5.35 //
GK19asvbuc2u:710: atha merugururguruṃ babhāṣe yadi nāsti krama eṣa nāsmi vāryaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:711: śaraṇājjvalanena dahyamānānna hi niścikramiṣuḥ kṣamaṃ grahītum // Bc_5.37 //
GK19asvbuc2u:712: jagataśca yadā dhruvo viyogo nanu dharmāya varaṃ svayaviyogaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:714: iti bhūmipatirniśamya tasya vyavasāyaṃ tanayasya nirmumukṣoḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:715: abhidhāya na yāsyatīti bhūyo vidadhe rakṣaṇamuttamāṃśca kāmān // Bc_5.39 //
GK19asvbuc2u:717: guruṇā ca nivārito 'śrupātaiḥ praviveśāvasathaṃ tataḥ sa śocan // Bc_5.40 //
GK19asvbuc2u:722: vigate divase tato vimānaṃ vapuṣā sūrya iva pradīpyamānaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:725: adhiruhya sa vajrabhakticitraṃ pravaraṃ kāñcanamāsanaṃ siṣeve // Bc_5.44 //
GK19asvbuc2u:728: paramairapi divyatūryakalpaiḥ sa tu tairnaiva ratiṃ yayau na harṣam /
GK19asvbuc2u:729: paramārthasukhāya tasya sādhorabhiniścikramiṣā yato na reme // Bc_5.46 //
GK19asvbuc2u:732: abhavacchayitā hi tatra kācidviniveśya pracale kare kapolam /
GK19asvbuc2u:733: dayitāmapi rukmapattracitrāṃ kupitevāṅkagatāṃ vihāya vīṇām // Bc_5.48 //
GK19asvbuc2u:737: svapiti sma tathāparā bhujābhyāṃ parirabhya priyavanmṛdaṅgameva // Bc_5.50 //
GK19asvbuc2u:739: avaśā ghananidrayā nipeturgajabhagnā iva karṇikāraśākhāḥ // Bc_5.51 //
GK19asvbuc2u:746: mahatī parivādinī ca kācidvanitāliṅgya sakhīmiva prasuptā /
GK19asvbuc2u:755: viniśaśvasurulbaṇaṃ śayānā vikṛtāḥ kṣiptabhūjā jajṛmbhire ca // Bc_5.59 //
GK19asvbuc2u:757: animīlitaśuklaniścalākṣyo na virejuḥ śayitā gatāsukalpāḥ // Bc_5.60 //
GK19asvbuc2u:759: aparā madaghūrṇiteva śiśye na babhāse vikṛtaṃ vapuḥ pupoṣa // Bc_5.61 //
GK19asvbuc2u:760: iti sattvakulānvayānurūpaṃ vividhaṃ sa pramadājanaḥ śayānaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:761: sarasaḥ sadṛśaṃ babhāra rūpaṃ pavanāvarjitarugnapuṣkarasya // Bc_5.62 //
GK19asvbuc2u:762: samavekṣya tathā tathā śayānā vikṛtāstā yuvatīradhīraceṣṭāḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:763: guṇavadvapuṣo 'pi valgubhāṣā nṛpasūnuḥ sa vigarhayāṃbabhūva // Bc_5.63 //
GK19asvbuc2u:765: vasanābharaṇaistu vañcyamānaḥ puruṣaḥ strīviṣayeṣu rāgameti // Bc_5.64 //
GK19asvbuc2u:766: vimṛśedyadi yoṣitāṃ manuṣyaḥ prakṛtiṃ svapnavikāramīdṛśaṃ ca /
GK19asvbuc2u:767: dhruvamatra na vardhayetpramādaṃ guṇasaṃkalpahatastu rāgameti // Bc_5.65 //
GK19asvbuc2u:768: iti tasya tadantaraṃ viditvā niśi niścikramiṣā samudbabhūva /
GK19asvbuc2u:771: avatīrya tataśca nirviśaṅko gṛhakakṣyāṃ prathamāṃ vinirjagāma // Bc_5.67 //
GK19asvbuc2u:773: hayamānaya kanthakaṃ tvarāvānamṛtaṃ prāptumito 'dya me yiyāsā // Bc_5.68 //
GK19asvbuc2u:774: hṛdi yā mama tuṣṭiradya jātā vyavasāyaśca yathā matau niviṣṭaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:775: vijane 'pi ca nāthavānivāsmi dhruvamartho 'bhimukhaḥ sameta iṣṭaḥ // Bc_5.69 //
GK19asvbuc2u:776: hriyameva ca saṃnatiṃ ca hitvā śayitā matpramukhe yathā yuvatyaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:777: vivṛte ca yathā svayaṃ kapāṭe niyataṃ yātumato mamādya kālaḥ // Bc_5.70 //
GK19asvbuc2u:778: pratigṛhya tataḥ sa bharturājñāṃ viditārtho 'pi narendraśāsanasya /
GK19asvbuc2u:779: manasīva pareṇa codyamānasturagasyānayane matiṃ cakāra // Bc_5.71 //
GK19asvbuc2u:781: balasattvajavānvayopapannaṃ sa varāśvaṃ tamupānināya bhartre // Bc_5.72 //
GK19asvbuc2u:784: upaguhya sa taṃ viśālavakṣāḥ kamalābhena ca sāntvayan kareṇa /
GK19asvbuc2u:785: madhurākṣarayā girā śaśāsa dhvajinīmadhyamiva praveṣṭukāmaḥ // Bc_5.74 //
GK19asvbuc2u:786: bahuśaḥ kila śatravo nirastāḥ samare tvāmadhiruhya pārthivena /
GK19asvbuc2u:787: ahamapyamṛtaṃ padaṃ yathāvatturagaśreṣṭha labheya tatkuruṣva // Bc_5.75 //
GK19asvbuc2u:788: sulabhāḥ khalu saṃyuge sahāyā viṣayāvāptasukhe dhanārjane vā /
GK19asvbuc2u:789: puruṣasya tu durlabhāḥ sahāyāḥ patitasyāpadi dharmasaṃśraye vā // Bc_5.76 //
GK19asvbuc2u:790: iha caiva bhavanti ye sahāyāḥ kaluṣe karmaṇi dharmasaṃśraye vā /
GK19asvbuc2u:791: avagacchati me yathāntarātmā niyataṃ te 'pi janāstadaṃśabhājaḥ // Bc_5.77 //
GK19asvbuc2u:792: tadidaṃ parigamya dharmayuktaṃ mama niryāṇamito jagaddhitāya /
GK19asvbuc2u:793: turagottama vegavikramābhyāṃ prayatasvātmahite jagaddhite ca // Bc_5.78 //
GK19asvbuc2u:794: iti suhṛdamivānuśiṣya kṛtye turagavaraṃ nṛvaro vanaṃ yiyāsuḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:796: atha sa pariharanniśīthacaṇḍaṃ parijanabodhakaraṃ dhvanīṃ sadaśvaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:801: vrajati nṛpasute gatasvanāstāḥ svayamabhavanvivṛtāḥ puraḥ pratolyaḥ // Bc_5.82 //
GK19asvbuc2u:802: pitaramabhimukhaṃ sutaṃ ca bālaṃ janamanuraktamanuttamāṃ ca lakṣmīm /
GK19asvbuc2u:803: kṛtamatirapahāya nirvyapekṣaḥ pitṛnagarātsa tato vinirjagāma // Bc_5.83 //
GK19asvbuc2u:804: atha sa vimalapaṅkajāyatākṣaḥ puramavalokya nanāda siṃhanādam /
GK19asvbuc2u:805: jananamaraṇayoradṛṣṭapāro na puramahaṃ kapilāvhayaṃ praveṣṭā // Bc_5.84 //
GK19asvbuc2u:806: iti vacanamidaṃ niśamya tasya draviṇapateḥ pariṣadgaṇā nananduḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:809: akṛṣata tuhine pathi prakāśaṃ ghanavivaraprasṛtā ivendupādāḥ // Bc_5.86 //
GK19asvbuc2u:811: aruṇaparuṣatāramantarikṣaṃ sa ca subahūni jagāma yojanāni // Bc_5.87 //
GK19asvbuc2u:812: iti buddhacarite mahākāvye 'bhiniṣkramaṇo nāma pañcamaḥ sargaḥ // 5 //
GK19asvbuc2u:815: bhārgavasyāśramapadaṃ sa dadarśa nṛṇāṃ varaḥ // Bc_6.1 //
GK19asvbuc2u:817: viśrānta iva yaddṛṣṭvā kṛtārtha iva cābhavat // Bc_6.2 //
GK19asvbuc2u:829: yasya te mayi bhāvo 'yaṃ phalebhyo 'pi parāṅmukhaḥ // Bc_6.8 //

GK19asvbuc2u:1091: pataddhi jahruḥ salilaṃ na netrajaṃ mano nininduśca phalotthamātmanaḥ // Bc_8.11 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1092: athocuradyaiva viśāma tadvanaṃ gataḥ sa yatra dviparājavikramaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1093: jijīviṣā nāsti hi tena no vinā yathendriyāṇāṃ vigame śarīriṇām // Bc_8.12 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1094: idaṃ puraṃ tena vivarjitaṃ vanaṃ vanaṃ ca tattena samanvitaṃ puram /
GK19asvbuc2u:1095: na śobhate tena hi no vinā puraṃ marutvatā vṛtravadhe yathā divam // Bc_8.13 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1096: punaḥ kumāro vinivṛtta ityatho gavākṣamālāḥ pratipedire 'ṅganāḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1097: viviktapṛṣṭhaṃ ca niśāmya vājinaṃ punargavākṣāṇi pidhāya cukruśuḥ // Bc_8.14 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1098: praviṣṭadīkṣastu sutopalabdhaye vratena śokena ca khinnamānasaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1099: jajāpa devāyatane narādhipaścakāra tāstāśca yathāśayāḥ kriyāḥ // Bc_8.15 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1101: viveśa śokābhihato nṛpakṣayaṃ yudhāpinīte ripuṇeva bhartari // Bc_8.16 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1103: svareṇa puṣṭena rurāva kanthako janāya duḥkhaṃ prativedayanniva // Bc_8.17 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1105: hayasya tasya pratisasvanuḥ svanaṃ narendrasūnorupayānaśaṅkinaḥ // Bc_8.18 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1107: yathā hayaḥ kanthaka eṣa heṣate dhruvaṃ kumāro viśatīti menire // Bc_8.19 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1111: striyo na rejurmṛjayā vinākṛtā divīva tārā rajanīkṣayāruṇāḥ // Bc_8.21 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1114: nirīkṣya tā bāṣpaparītalocanā nirāśrayaṃ chandakamaśvameva ca /
GK19asvbuc2u:1115: viṣaṇṇavaktrā rurudurvarāṅganā vanāntare gāva ivarṣabhojjhitāḥ // Bc_8.23 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1116: tataḥ sabāṣpā mahīṣī mahīpateḥ pranaṣṭavatsā mahiṣīva vatsalā /
GK19asvbuc2u:1117: pragṛhya bāhū nipapāta gautamī vilolaparṇā kadalīva kāñcanī // Bc_8.24 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1118: hatatviṣo 'nyāḥ śithilāṃsabāhavaḥ striyo viṣādena vicetanā iva /
GK19asvbuc2u:1119: na cukruśurnāśru jahurna śaśvasurna celurāsurlikhitā iva sthitāḥ // Bc_8.25 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1122: mukhaiśca tāsāṃ nāyanāmbutāḍitaiṃ rarāja tadrājaniveśanaṃ tadā /
GK19asvbuc2u:1125: urāṃsi jaghnuḥ kamalopamaiḥ karaiḥ svapallavairvātacalā latā iva // Bc_8.28 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1126: karaprahārapracalaiśca tā babhustathāpi nāryaḥ sahitonnataiḥ stanaiḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1128: yathā ca vakṣāṃsi karairapīḍayaṃstathaiva vakṣobhirapīḍayan karān /
GK19asvbuc2u:1129: akārayaṃstatra parasparaṃ vyathāḥ karāgravakṣāṃsyabalā dayālasāḥ // Bc_8.30 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1132: niśi prasuptāmavaśāṃ vihāya māṃ gataḥ kva sa chandaka manmanorathaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1133: upāgate ca tvayi kanthake ca me samaṃ gateṣu triṣu kampate manaḥ // Bc_8.32 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1134: anāryamasnigdhamamitrakarma me nṛśaṃsa kṛtvā kimihādya rodiṣi /
GK19asvbuc2u:1135: niyaccha bāṣpaṃ bhava tuṣṭamānaso na saṃvadatyaśru ca tacca karma te // Bc_8.33 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1136: priyeṇa vaśyena hitena sādhunā tvayā sahāyena yathārthakāriṇā /
GK19asvbuc2u:1137: gato 'ryaputro hyapunarnivṛttaye ramasva diṣṭyā saphalaḥ śramastava // Bc_8.34 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1139: suhṛdbruveṇa hyavipaścitā tvayā kṛtaḥ kulasyāsya mahānupaplavaḥ // Bc_8.35 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1141: sthite 'pi patyau himavanmahīsame pranaṣṭaśobhā vidhavā iva striyaḥ // Bc_8.36 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1144: anarthakāmo 'sya janasya sarvathā turaṅgamo 'pi dhruvameṣa kanthakaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1145: jahāra sarvasvamitastathā hi me jane prasupte niśi ratnacauravat // Bc_8.38 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1146: yadā samarthaḥ khalu soḍhumāgatāniṣuprahārānapi kiṃ punaḥ kaśāḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1147: gataḥ kaśāpātabhayātkathaṃ nvayaṃ śriyaṃ gṛhītvā hṛdayaṃ ca me samam // Bc_8.39 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1149: yadā tu nirvāhayati sma me priyaṃ tadā hi mūkasturagādhamo 'bhavat // Bc_8.40 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1150: yadi hyaheṣiṣyata bodhayan janaṃ khuraiḥ kṣitau vāpyakariṣyata dhvanim /
GK19asvbuc2u:1151: hanusvanaṃ vājanayiṣyaduttamaṃ na cābhaviṣyanmama duḥkhamīdṛśam // Bc_8.41 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1152: itīha devyāḥ paridevitāśrayaṃ niśamya bāṣpagrathitākṣaraṃ vacaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1153: adhomukhaḥ sāśrukalaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ śanairidaṃ chandaka uttaraṃ jagau // Bc_8.42 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1154: vigarhituṃ nārhasi devi kanthakaṃ na cāpi roṣaṃ mayi kartumarhasi /
GK19asvbuc2u:1155: anāgasau svaḥ samavehi sarvaśo gato nṛdevaḥ sa hi devi devavat // Bc_8.43 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1156: ahaṃ hi jānannapi rājaśāsanaṃ balātkṛtaḥ kairapi daivatairiva /
GK19asvbuc2u:1157: upānayaṃ tūrṇamimaṃ turaṅgamaṃ tathānvagacchaṃ vigataśramo 'dhvani // Bc_8.44 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1159: tathaiva daivādiva saṃyatānano hanusvanaṃ nākṛta nāpyaheṣata // Bc_8.45 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1161: tamaśca naiśaṃ raviṇeva pāṭitaṃ tapo 'pi daivo vidhireṣa gṛhyatām // Bc_8.46 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1162: yadapramatto 'pi narendraśāsanād gṛhe pure civa sahasraśo janaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1163: tadā sa nābudhyata nidrayā hṛtastato 'pi daivo vidhireṣa gṛhyatām // Bc_8.47 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1164: yataśca vāso vanavāsasaṃmataṃ nisṛṣṭamasmai samaye divaukasā /
GK19asvbuc2u:1165: divi praviddhaṃ mukuṭaṃ ca taddhṛtaṃ tato 'pi daivo vidhireṣa gṛhyatām // Bc_8.48 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1166: tadevamāvāṃ naradevi doṣato na tatprayātaṃ prati gantumarhasi /
GK19asvbuc2u:1167: na kāmakāro mama nāsya vājinaḥ kṛtānuyātraḥ sa hi daivatairgataḥ // Bc_8.49 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1168: iti prayāṇaṃ bahudevamadbhūtaṃ niśamya tāstasya mahātmanaḥ striyaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1169: pranaṣṭaśokā iva vismayaṃ yayurmanojvaraṃ pravrajanāttu lebhire // Bc_8.50 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1171: vihāya dhairya virurāva gautamī tatāma caivāśrumukhī jagāda ca // Bc_8.51 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1173: praveritāste bhuvi tasya murdhajā narendramaulīpariveṣṭanakṣamāḥ // Bc_8.52 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1177: gatastato 'sau guṇavān hi tādṛśo nṛpaḥ prajābhāgyaguṇaiḥ prasūyate // Bc_8.54 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1179: vanāntabhūmiṃ kaṭhināṃ kathaṃ nu tau sacakramadhyau caraṇau gamiṣyataḥ // Bc_8.55 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1181: kathaṃ nu śītoṣṇajalāgameṣu taccharīramojasvi vane bhaviṣyati // Bc_8.56 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1182: kulena sattvena balena varcasā śrutena lakṣmyā vayasā ca garvitaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1183: pradātumevābhyucito na yācituṃ kathaṃ sa bhikṣāṃ parataścariṣyati // Bc_8.57 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1184: śucau śayitvā śayane hiraṇmaye prabodhyamāno niśi tūryanisvanaiḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1185: kathaṃ bata svapsyati so 'dya me vratī paṭaikadeśāntarite mahītale // Bc_8.58 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1186: imaṃ pralāpaṃ karuṇaṃ niśamya tā bhujaiḥ pariṣvajya parasparaṃ striyaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1187: vilocanebhyaḥ salilāni tatyajurmadhūni puṣpebhya iveritā latāḥ // Bc_8.59 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1189: śanaiśca tattadvilalāpa viklavā muhurmuhurgadgadaruddhayā girā // Bc_8.60 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1190: sa māmanāthāṃ sahadharmacāriṇīmapāsya dharma yadi kartumicchati /
GK19asvbuc2u:1191: kuto 'sya dharmaḥ sahadharmacāriṇī vinā tapo yaḥ paribhoktumicchati // Bc_8.61 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1192: śṛṇoti nūnaṃ sa na pūrvapārthivānmahāsudarśaprabhṛtīn pitāmahān /
GK19asvbuc2u:1193: vanāni patnīsahitānupeyuṣastathā hi dharma madṛte cikīrṣīte // Bc_8.62 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1194: makheṣu vā vedavidhānasaṃskṛtau na daṃpatī paśyati dīkṣitābubhau /
GK19asvbuc2u:1195: samaṃ bubhukṣū parato 'pi tatphalaṃ tato 'sya jāto mayi dharmamatsaraḥ // Bc_8.63 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1196: dhruvaṃ sa jānanmama dharmavallabho manaḥ priyerṣyākalahaṃ muhurmithaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1197: sukhaṃ vibhīrmāmapahāya roṣaṇāṃ mahendraloke 'psaraso jighṛkṣati // Bc_8.64 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1198: iyaṃ tu cintā mama kīdṛśaṃ nu tā vapurguṇaṃ bibhrati tatra yoṣitaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1199: vane yadartha sa tapāṃsi tapyate śriyaṃ ca hitvā mama bhaktimeva ca // Bc_8.65 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1200: na khalviyaṃ svargasukhāya me spṛhā na tajjanasyātmavato 'pi durlabham /
GK19asvbuc2u:1201: sa tu priyo māmiha vā paratra vā kathaṃ na jahyāditi me manorathaḥ // Bc_8.66 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1203: na mandabhāgyo 'rhati rāhulo 'pyayaṃ kadācidaṅke parivartituṃ pituḥ // Bc_8.67 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1204: aho nṛśaṃsaṃ sukumāravarcasaḥ sudāruṇaṃ tasya manasvino manaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1205: kalapralāpaṃ dviṣato 'pi harṣaṇaṃ śiśuṃ sutaṃ yastyajatīdṛśaṃ bata // Bc_8.68 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1206: mamāpi kāmaṃ hṛdayaṃ sudāruṇaṃ śilāmayaṃ vāpyayaso 'pi vā kṛtam /
GK19asvbuc2u:1207: anāthavacchrīrahite sukhocite vanaṃ gate bhartari yanna dīryate // Bc_8.69 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1208: itīha devī patiśokamūrchitā ruroda dadhyau vilalāpa cāsakṛt /
GK19asvbuc2u:1209: svabhāvadhīrāpi hi sā satī śucā dhṛtiṃ na sasmāra cakāra no hriyam // Bc_8.70 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1213: janasya tejārtaraveṇa cāhataścacāla vajradhvanineva vāraṇaḥ // Bc_8.72 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1214: niśāmya ca cchandakakanthakāvubhau sutasya saṃśrutya ca niścayaṃ sthiram /
GK19asvbuc2u:1215: papāta śokābhihato mahīpatiḥ śacīpatervṛtta ivotsave dhvajaḥ // Bc_8.73 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1216: tato muhūrta sutaśokamohito janena tulyābhijanena dhāritaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1217: nirīkṣya dṛṣṭyā jalapūrṇayā hayaṃ mahītalastho vilalāpa pārthivaḥ // Bc_8.74 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1218: bahūni kṛtvā samare priyāṇi me mahattvayā kanthaka vipriyaṃ kṛtam /
GK19asvbuc2u:1219: guṇapriyo yena vane sa me priyaḥ priyo 'pi sannapriyavatpraveritaḥ // Bc_8.75 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1220: tadadya māṃ vā naya tatra yatra sa vraja drutaṃ vā punarenamānaya /
GK19asvbuc2u:1221: ṛte hi tasmānmama nāsti jīvitaṃ vigāḍharogasya sadauṣadhādiva // Bc_8.76 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1222: suvarṇaniṣṭhīvini mṛtyunā hṛte suduṣkaraṃ yanna mamāra saṃjayaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1223: ahaṃ punardharmaratau sute gate mumukṣurātmānamanātmavāniva // Bc_8.77 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1225: priyeṇa putreṇa satā vinākṛtaṃ kathaṃ na muhyeddhi mano manorapi // Bc_8.78 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1226: ajasya rājñastanayāya dhīmate narādhipāyendrasakhāya me spṛhā /
GK19asvbuc2u:1227: gate vanaṃ yastanaye divaṃ gato na moghabāṣpaḥ kṛpaṇaṃ jijīva ha // Bc_8.79 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1228: pracakṣva me bhadra tadāśramājiraṃ hṛtastvayā yatra sa me jalāñjaliḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1229: ime parīpsanti hi taṃ pipāsavo mamāsavaḥ pretagatiṃ yiyāsavaḥ // Bc_8.80 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1230: iti tanayaviyogajātaduḥkha kṣitisadṛśaṃ sahajaṃ vihāya dhairyam /
GK19asvbuc2u:1231: daśaratha iva rāmaśokavaśyo bahu vilalāpa nṛpo visaṃjñakalpaḥ // Bc_8.81 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1233: samadhṛtamidamūcaturyathāvanna ca pariptamukhau na cāpyaśokau // Bc_8.82 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1234: tyaja naravara śokamehi dhairya kudhṛtirivārhasi dhīra nāśru moktum /
GK19asvbuc2u:1235: srajamiva mṛditāmapāsya lakṣmīṃ bhuvi bahavo hi nṛpā vanānyabhīyuḥ // Bc_8.83 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1236: api ca niyata eṣa tasya bhāvaḥ smara vacanaṃ tadṛṣeḥ purāsitasya /
GK19asvbuc2u:1237: na hi sa divi na cakravartirājye kṣaṇamapi vāsayituṃ sukhena śakyaḥ // Bc_8.84 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1238: yadi tu nṛvara kārya eva yatnastvaritamudāhara yāvadatra yāvaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1239: bahuvidhimiha yuddhamastu tāvattava tanayasya vidheśca tasya tasya // Bc_8.85 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1240: narapatiratha tau śaśāsa tasmād drutamita eva yuvāmabhiprayātam /
GK19asvbuc2u:1241: na hi mama hṛdayaṃ prayāti śāntiṃ vanaśakuneriva putralālasasya // Bc_8.86 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1243: kṛtamiti savadhūjanaḥ sadāro nṛpatirapi pracakāra śeṣakāryam // Bc_8.87 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1247: viddhau sadaśvāviva sarvayatnātsauhārdaśīghraṃ yayaturvanaṃ tat // Bc_9.1 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1250: tau nyāyatastaṃ pratipūjya vipraṃ tenārcitau tāvapi cānurūpam /
GK19asvbuc2u:1253: imaṃ janaṃ vettu bhavānadhītaṃ śrutagrahe mantraparigrahe ca // Bc_9.4 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1255: ihābhyutepaḥ kila tasya hetorāvāmupetau bhagavānavaitu // Bc_9.5 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1256: tau so 'bravīdasti sa dīrghabāhuḥ prāptaḥ kumāro na tu nāvabuddhaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1258: tasmāttatastāvupalabhya tattvaṃ taṃ vipramāmantrya tadaiva sadyaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1259: khinnāvakhinnāviva rājabhaktyā prasasratustena yataḥ sa yātaḥ // Bc_9.7 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1260: yāntau tatastau mṛjayā vihīnamapaśyatāṃ taṃ vapuṣojjvalantam /
GK19asvbuc2u:1261: upopaviṣṭaṃ pathi vṛkṣamūle sūrya ghanābhogamiva praviṣṭam // Bc_9.8 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1262: yānaṃ vihāyopayayau tatastaṃ purohito mantradhareṇa sārdham /
GK19asvbuc2u:1263: yathā vanasthaṃ sahavāmadevo rāmaṃ didṛkṣurmunirāvairvaśeyaḥ // Bc_9.9 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1265: pratyarcayāmāsa sa cārhatastau divīva śukrāṅgirasau mahendraḥ // Bc_9.10 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1267: virejatustasya ca saṃnikarṣe punarvasū yogagatāvivendoḥ // Bc_9.11 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1269: yathopaviṣṭaṃ divi pārijāte bṛhaspatiḥ śakrasutaṃ jayantam // Bc_9.12 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1270: tvacchokaśalye hṛdayāvagāḍhe mohaṃ gato bhūmitale muhūrtam /
GK19asvbuc2u:1271: kumāra rājā nayanāmbuvarṣo yattvāmavocattadidaṃ nibodha // Bc_9.13 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1272: jānāmi dharma prati niścayaṃ te paraimi te bhāvinametamartham /
GK19asvbuc2u:1273: ahaṃ tvakāle vanasaṃśrayātte śokāgnināgnipratimena dahye // Bc_9.14 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1274: tadehi dharmapriya matpriyārtha dharmārthameva tyaja buddhimetām /
GK19asvbuc2u:1275: ayaṃ hi mā śokarayaḥ pravṛddhau nadīrayaḥ kūlamivābhihanti // Bc_9.15 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1277: tāṃ vṛttimasmāsu karoti śoko vikarṣaṇocchoṣaṇadāhabhedaiḥ // Bc_9.16 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1278: tadbhuṅkṣva tāvadvasudhādhipatyaṃ kāle vanaṃ yāsyāsi śāstradṛṣṭe /
GK19asvbuc2u:1279: aniṣṭabandhau kuru mayyapekṣāṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu dayā hi dharmaḥ // Bc_9.17 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1280: na caiṣa dharmo vana eva siddhaḥ pure 'pi siddhirniyatā yatīnām /
GK19asvbuc2u:1281: buddhiśca yatnaśca nimittamatra vana ca liṅgaṃ ca hi bhīrucinham // Bc_9.18 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1283: lakṣbhyaṅkamadhye parivartamānaiḥ prāpto gṛhasthairapi mokṣadharmaḥ // Bc_9.19 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1285: videharājaṃ janakaṃ tathaiva śālvadrumaṃ senajitaśca rājñaḥ // Bc_9.20 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1287: ubhe 'pi tasmādyugapadbhajasva cittādhipatyaṃ ca nṛpaśriyaṃ ca // Bc_9.21 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1288: icchāmi hi tvāmupaguhya gāḍhaṃ kṛtābhiṣekaṃ salilārdrameva /
GK19asvbuc2u:1289: dhṛtātapattraṃ samudīkṣamāṇastenaiva harṣeṇa vanaṃ praveṣṭum // Bc_9.22 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1291: śrutvā bhavānarhati tatpriyārtha snehena tasnehamanuprayātum // Bc_9.23 //
GK19asvbuc2u:1292: śokāmbhasi tvatprabhave hyagādhe duḥkhārṇave majjati śākyarājaḥ /
GK19asvbuc2u:1293: tasmāttamuttāraya nāthahīnaṃ nirāśrayaṃ magnamivārṇave nauḥ // Bc_9.24 //
